channel.title: Thank You Moparisthebest
channel.description:
While this forum may [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,297369.0.html]fail[/url], it is not an utter loss. I would just like to say thank you to a few members of this community (specifically the ones who aren't mongoloids and imbeciles). Being a member here has taught me many things, the first and foremost, when you should just shut the fuck up.
When I joined these forums, I was a narrow minded catholic fag. The people here introduced me to the concept of atheism, and I am now proud to call myself an atheistic agnosticist, free from pathetic religious events and the like.
I am now a frequent user of mind altering substances, and no longer believe the biased utterly untrue bullshit that is fed to us in school. Thanks to MITB, I now have an open mind and have taken the time to do my own research.
This community, while pathetic, and for some reason based around runescape, is unique from all other communities. You cannot say whatever you like, as it is quite likely you will be shot down. People who give a shit what others think of them will not last long here. It is that quality that makes posting here an enjoyable experience.
What I'm trying to say: http://youtube.com/watch?v=oHg5SJYRHA0
/thread.

ROFL, says the guy who says his balls are fast.

ROFL, says the guy who says he was raped.
Get the fuck out of this thread you imbecile and mongoloid.
[/quote]
How could i get out if i never was in it? I never went in side dummy, a thread is not a object, because its only virtual, now you get raped.[/quote]Wow,
Taking it literally: You’re the biggest fucking idiot.
Being sarcastic: You’re the biggest fucking idiot.

Nice moparscape-type reply.

item.title: Thank You Moparisthebest
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

How does being an “atheist agnostic” work, in the context of religion? You believe that the existance of a deity is inherently unknowable yet dosen’t exist? I realise there are other forms of agnosticism, but you mentioned it as an opposing view to catholiscm, so I assume you meant agnostic in the theist sense.

You’re right though, this community is, on the whole, full of pretty cool people, it just happens to be heavily cancerous also at the moment.

Make sure the mind altering substances stay within HR and all that shit

Read full topic

When I joined these forums, I was a narrow minded catholic fag. The people here introduced me to the concept of atheism, and I am now proud to call myself an atheistic agnosticist, free from pathetic religious events and the like.

This community, while pathetic, and for some reason based around runescape, is unique from all other communities. You cannot say whatever you like, as it is quite likely you will be shot down.
